name: Mips
description:
The goal is to keep the ball on the screen. Go out of bounds, and you lose. If you're playing on desktop, use A to move left, D to move right. If you're playing on Android, tilt your device to move.

This is still a work in progress.

I wrote it for the My First Game Jam: Winter 2020. It's written in Java mainly with the GDX game library. All of the assets were taken from kenney.nl.
